price: 20. (Esta) derretirá lo que se halle en el interior de los estómagos, así como la piel.
arabic: يُصۡهَرُ بِهِۦ مَا فِي بُطُونِهِمۡ وَٱلۡجُلُودُ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yuṣ'haru bihi mā fī buṭūnihim wal-julūdu
